ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Hate armor drops increased?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Bah.  The last 4 Hate trips my fellow bards and I have been on (last two were Saturday and last night) have yielded zero bard items.  The Maestro has
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 27 Mar 2000, Ronnie Roads wrote:
>
> After we cleared roamers we go a scorn banshee pull. It
> dropped boots! There were three of us; one already had
> [...]
> the kill. They said "Mara go ahead and look..." Boots
> again! A couple more pulls...another scorn banshee...and
> a bracer for the third bard there.
> [...]
> Last night they were full, so I didn't get to go up. The
> banshees dropped two sets of arms and the weapon.
>
> I have to say, I don't know if they changed the drop rates
> but I hope it keep up!

Bah. The last 4 Hate trips my fellow bards and I have been on
(last two were Saturday and last night) have yielded zero bard
items. The Maestro has dropped that stupid mask and shield
every time. The only bard item we've gotten since I got my
leggings (what, 3-4 weeks ago?) is a bracer that dropped in
Fear.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
